title: Chiisana Ojisan
alternative_title: Mini Oyaji, Little Old Man, ちいさなおじさん
description: Noi Asano’s Chiisai Oyaji Nikki (Tiny Old Man’s Diary) manga will receive a television anime adaptation under the name Chiisana Ojisan starting in October. Kachidoki Studio (Litchi DE Hikari Club, Nukko.) is animating the series, which will premiere on Chiba TV.
